Like-Like listened to what he believed a fantasy tale, where magic happens.=
 But he paid careful mind to it, although later he'd probably forget it. He=
 wondered how come Megatron was stuck inside Galvatron, and wondered if it =
happened by accident...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: kinger01030=
@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, February 09, 2001 2:=
20 PM
  Subject: Re: Galvatron spare parts


  Galvatron heard the thoughts=
 of Megatron in his head. "We have barley any 
  connections but one is rea=
ding the mind. You where not trapped. You where 
  part of me. You where wh=
at drove we to finaly defeat Valtron. And for that I 
  will always be grat=
efull." He looked behind to see LikeLike following. He 
  thought the bot w=
ould be useful so he let it be. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor

                    www.  .com
